r.d: * Building absolute URLs * RFC compliant HTTP redirects * RFC compliant HTTP date handling * Parsing of HTTP headers and messages * Caching by "Last-Modified" and/or ETag (with 'on the fly' option for ETag generation from buffered output) * Sending data/files/streams with (multiple) ranges support * Negotiating user preferred language/charset * Convenient request functionality built upon libcurl * PHP5 classes: HttpUtil, HttpResponse (PHP-5.1), HttpRequest, HttpRequestPool, HttpMessage
r.n: * Fixed build with PHP-4 and PHP-5.0
